title: Half-Smile in Action
introText: Select a specific daily activity and incorporate Half-Smile during that time. Notice how this simple practice shifts your focus or emotional state during routine moments.

sections.title: Before Starting
sections.description: How do you feel before starting the activity? Note your mood and energy level.
sections.placeholder: e.g., Feeling rushed, a bit stressed, mind is busy...

sections.title: During the Activity
sections.description: What did you notice while maintaining Half-Smile during the activity?
sections.placeholder: e.g., I noticed my thoughts slowing down, the activity felt less like a chore...

sections.title: After Finishing
sections.description: How do you feel after completing the activity with Half-Smile?

sections.title: What Changed?
sections.description: Overall, how did Half-Smile shift your focus or emotional state during this activity?
sections.placeholder: Reflect on the difference Half-Smile made...
